00033 typedef struct project_list_t {
00034     int layerno;
00035     char *filename;
00036     int rgb[3];
00037     char inverted;
00038     char is_pnp;
00039     char visible;
00040     gerbv_HID_Attribute *attr_list;
00041     int n_attr;
00042     struct project_list_t *next;
00043 } project_list_t;
